application-form-type.legend: How are you applying for your low THC cannabis license?

continue-an-application.label: Continue an application
continue-an-application.hint: An incomplete application stays on the system for 5 days and is then deleted

licensee-type.legend: What type of low THC cannabis licensee are you?

existing-licensee-renew-or-change-site.label: Existing licensee renewing or changing a currently licensed site

existing-licensee-applying-for-new-site.label: Existing licensee applying for a new site

company-number.label: Company number (optional)
company-number.hint: Enter the  number issued by Companies House

site-responsible-DBS-check.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

responsible-person-dbs-fullname.label: Full name
responsible-person-dbs-fullname.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

responsible-officer-dbs-subscription.legend: Has the responsible person subscribed to DBS updates?

witness-destruction-plant.legend: Do you require somebody within your company to be authorised to witness the destruction of the plant?
witness-destruction-plant.hint: This includes the controlled parts of the plant (leaves and flowers)

how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.label: How will the leaves and flowers be destroyed?
how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.hint: Providing a detailed description will help us process your application faster

moving-site-date.hint: Enter the date you plan to move sites

authorise-witness-DBS-check.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.label: Full name
authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

hold-other-regulatory-licences.legend: Do you hold any Home Office or other regulatory licenses?
hold-other-regulatory-licences.hint: This includes animal scientific procedures and firearms

authorised-witness-dbs-subscription.legend: Has the authorised witness subscribed to DBS updates?

is-licence-refused.legend: Has your organisation ever been refused a licence?
is-licence-refused.hint: This means licences issued by central or local government bodies and authorities, including the police

refusal-reason.label: Details of why you were refused a licence
refusal-reason.hint: Enter details of what the licence was, the issuing body and the reason for the refusal
